data: [[400,[["PORTAL_BEAT_2ADVANCEDMAPS",{"strName":"纸杯蛋糕","strDescription":"完成两个传送门高级地图。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/400/portal_beat_2advancedmaps.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":18.799999237060547}],["PORTAL_KILL_COMPANIONCUBE",{"strName":"自相残杀","strDescription":"使尽浑身解数逃生。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/400/portal_kill_companioncube.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":64.5}],["PORTAL_ESCAPE_TESTCHAMBERS",{"strName":"常客","strDescription":"做出正确决定，摆好顺从姿势，等待派对同仁护送。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/400/portal_escape_testchambers.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":56.599998474121094}],["PORTAL_BEAT_GAME",{"strName":"伤心的人","strDescription":"完成传送门。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/400/portal_beat_game.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":53.099998474121094}],["PORTAL_GET_PORTALGUNS",{"strName":"实验室的老鼠","strDescription":"获得完整功能的光圈科技传送设备。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/400/portal_getportalguns.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":82}]]]]
